markdownRemark.html: Jay Jangles Children’s Centre offers spaces for children from 9 months to 5 year old. The nursery school follows a unique activity program, developed by British teachers and education experts. The nursery school provides the opportunity to learn through play in a creative and nurturing environment. It is a bilingual center, offering sessions & prices to meet all needs.

frontmatter.title: Jay Jangles Childrens Centre
